name: UX Documentation
description:
This documentation template is designed to make documenting your UX design work as easy as possible. This is a template for designers, but others may benefit as well.


There are multiple categories including:

  • Project Summary
  • Key Decisions
  • Product Goals
  • Scope/Not in Scope
  • Constraints


This template uses Auto Layout, so please add, show/hide, or remove any fields that you may or may not need.


I'm open to any feedback you have for this template. Thank you!
